text: The mayor of Pokhara is the head of the Municipal executive of Pokhara Metropolitan City. The role was first created in 1959. The current mayor is Dhana Raj Acharya. He was elected in the 2022 election.The position has been held by sixteen people since its creation. ==Local government== The city of Pokhara is governed by the Pokhara Metropolitan City Council. The mayor is supported by the municipal executive which has the deputy mayor and ward chairs of all 33 wards of Pokhara. == Related pages == *Mayor of Kathmandu *Mayor of Dharan *Mayor of Mechinagar *2022 Pokhara municipal election == References == Category:Lists of mayors
title: List of mayors of Pokhara
